entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump What kind of a freakin reality show are we watching..Our President saying that UV light or ingesting disinfectant may cure Coronavirus..It would actually be funny if 50,000 Americans weren’t dying.. Mr. 
President please seek help..
